docs.snippet: Telford Taylor, the court-appointed arbitrator, has ruled in favor of Gus Williams in Williams's salary and compensation dispute with the Seattle SuperSonics.   Williams, a free-agent guard who averaged 23.7 points last season, has sat out the fir...
docs.lead_paragraph: Telford Taylor, the court-appointed arbitrator, has ruled in favor of Gus Williams in Williams's salary and compensation dispute with the Seattle SuperSonics. Williams, a free-agent guard who averaged 23.7 points last season, has sat out the first half of this one. Mr. Taylor said Williams was free to sign with any team after the season. If he does, that club would not be required to compensate the Sonics.

headline.main: Ruling Is in Favor Of Gus Williams
